Description: Don't miss this rare opportunity to purchase a new construction home in Ansonia. There is still time to pick your colors and fixtures on this oversize 3 bed room raised ranch. Some of the houses main features are a massive deck off the kitchen with sliders looking over a private back yard. Also has oversize 2 car garage.  inside home has 2.5 baths, large family room with gas fireplace, dining room and formal LR  3 larger than normal bedrooms and open floor plan, high efficiency HVAC supplied by Propane gas. city sewer and city water too!!!  Call to schedule a walk through before its too late !!!

QUAINT 1800's FARMHOUSE WITH NEW ROOF,NEW SIDING,REFINISHED HARDWOOD FLOORS AND FRESHLY PAINTED. LARGE 3 CAR GARAGE ON OVERSIZED DOUBLE LOT,PLEANTY OF ROOM TO ADD ON TO THE HOUSE. APPROVED COMMERCIAL RENTAL ADD YOU FINISHING TOUCHES POSSIBILITIES ARE ENDLESS.

3 bedroom colonial style home with 2 car detached garage.  Charming home is in excellent condition with newer eat in kitchen with additional galley area, formal dining room, living room, and office on the 1st floor.  The kitchen has newer appliances including gas stove, refrigerator and dishwasher.  Hardwood floors, full basement with washer, dryer, and storage room.  Level private lot.  Driveway is not shared.  Power in the garage for potential work shop.  Nothing to do here but move in.

1999 Raised Ranch with a 2005 Addition of 2 bedrooms and full bath. Quiet street, great neighbors, last house on street, woods on two sides. Under 4 minutes to RT 8, Griffin Hospital, Smilow Center, and Osbournedale State Park. Approx. 23 minutes to I-95, I84, and Yale New Haven Hospital. Currently renting upstairs for extra income as a one bedroom, kitchenette, and full bath. All appliances included. 2019 installed Solar Panels. Great savings on electric bill. 2015 Furnace. Shed out back for equipment.

YOUR SEARCH IS OVER!!!!Completely remodeled Colonial in Hilltop area room for everyone in this seven room, three bedroom, two full and one half bath home. Spacious formal living room,  spacious family room attention to detail is the perfect backdrop to entertaining in style. Enjoy the state of the art kitchen. The lower level is completely finished and can be used as additional living space or home office. Schedule your private showing today.  Selling Agent is related.

This quintessential New England colonial has all the charming features of early American craftsmanship with all the modern amenities to include a large eat in kitchen, dining room, living room, 3 bedrooms and 1.5 baths. The lower level has additional living space and storage. The outside boasts a level yard with a pool and patio perfect for entertaining  with summer right around the corner. Perfect for commuting as well as shops and dining minutes away. Do not let this opportunity pass you by!

ATTENTION ALL BUILDERS AND INVESTORS!  TAKE ADVANTAGE OF OPPORTUNITY ZONE FUNDS WITH THIS APPROVED BUILDING LOT! There are restaurants in every direction you turn in this quaint Downtown area that is down the street from the train station and close to Rte 8 and Rte 15 and only 1.5 hour drive from NYC.    Don’t miss this opportunity!
